Description:
2 x Improvement Notice served,

1) You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the rotating chuck and tool of the Adcock & Shipley milling machine.

2) You have failed to ensure that exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely metalworking fluid (a respiratory sensitiser and cause of dermatitis) used in the Hurco VM20i CNC machine is prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.
